Operating System
Game Engine

Unified-Game-Engine

Coded in c++ and c. Uses OpenGL for rendering.

Located on Github. It is fairly new.
It uses a moduling / componenting system to allow for GameObject to gain functionality to what the user desires. They are even custom codable if desired.

This has been put aside for my OS to be worked on now. However when I get back to it I plan on implementing a Physics Engine.
